txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Shimmering essences from the Dead in Agamaur. Bring them to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur.
'They will rise no more. We will see that Radagast is given these prizes.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Radagast says that he can ensure that the spirits cannot return with the essence taken from the Dead that fall.'
Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur desires shimmering essences from the Dead found in Agamaur.
Deliver the shimmering essences to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Eriac the Strong to acquire shimmering essences from the Dead within the swamp south of Agamaur. You can find Eriac the Strong within the Eglain-camp at Agamaur.
Wanted: Shimmering essences from the Dead in Agamaur.
